channel.title: Comments on: Should I Give Away Dindy For Free?
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
There are forums, where I already advertised Dindy. Not aggressively, though.
Giving away a second related app is something I though of doing. I actually had an app ready but I was afraid that second app would be misunderstood as well and will end up hurting Dindy's sales. I guess I should have created a simple quality second app, such as an alarm clock or something like that.
Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
There are forums, where I already advertised Dindy. Not aggressively, though.

Giving away a second related app is something I though of doing. I actually had an app ready but I was afraid that second app would be misunderstood as well and will end up hurting Dindy’s sales. I guess I should have created a simple quality second app, such as an alarm clock or something like that.

Thanks.

item.title: By: Udim
item.dc:creator: Udim
item.description:
First, is there a forum where people can ask questions and help each other out?
Second, you could advertise Dindy by giving away a second related app.
item.content:encoded:
First, is there a forum where people can ask questions and help each other out?

Second, you could advertise Dindy by giving away a second related app.
